name: Bag Jelly
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The bag jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bag jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1}) acid damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 11}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
